thread.title: Video; Wasim Akram Mimics Legendary Amitabh Bachchan
thread.title_full: Video; Wasim Akram Mimics Legendary Amitabh Bachchan

title: Video; Wasim Akram Mimics Legendary Amitabh Bachchan
text: Saturday, 10 October 2015 15:24 Posted by Madiha Shakeel 20 Former Pakistan captain Wasim Akram, after having a successful career in cricket field and then in commentary, has debuted by mimicking Indian actor Amitabh Bachchan in his ‘dubsmash’ debut. Wasim Akram along with TV host Jatin Sapru, recorded his first ever dubmash video which was soon uploaded by Jatin on his twitter account. The dialogue is one of Amitabh Bachchan’s ‘Agneepath’, most memorable one. Dubsmash is a latest trend these days, with every sport and showbiz personality recording a short clip by mimicking their favorite personalities. Many Pakistani players in recent past have dubsmashed many of them which have created buzz on social media. Former Pakistan captain Shoaib Malik and opener Ahmad Shehzad are known for their dubsmashes. Copyright Business Recorder, 2015
